commentText:
It's peculiar that the worst of people regularly reference N4zis and the H0l0cau$t to make their point.

>duterte wanted to kill 3 million drug dealers because Hitler killed "3 million" Jews.

>Rep. greene of the US made a series of such references one of which is likening "mask use" to the Star of David used to segregate Jews from society.

>Here's human rights expert roque equating "old communists" to N4zis prosecuted for war crimes and genocide.


roque is engaging in an actual hyperbole via simile to make a point - unlike duterte's "jet ski" promise which was a metaphor to his stand against china in the WPS. A little thought though on his words reveal he is an:


a> utter pandering pig scrounging support for fascist forces of assassination from a fast dwindling diehar-dds base and,


b> a snake skinned pig who sheds all pretense for justice by likening the CPP-NPA to N4zis who promoted racial superiority, and eradicating Jews whom Hitler blamed for Germany's economic problems - or "doldrums".


Hitler - 6 million Jews and millions more dead from the war itself.

duterte - 30,000+ dead in 5 years from his drug and anti-communist wars

Islamic separatists - various Marawi type atrocities, kidnappings, beheadings, bombings, ...


I am sure roque as a UP graduate knows that context, proportion, and magnitude makes his comparison of an old communist to Mengele and Goering nothing more than pure propaganda for diehar-dds consumption, and justification for duterte's red-tagging task force. That's acceptable since lawyers are not saints but make wonderful propagandists.


But I am equally sure that his desperation fueled zeal to plug the holes of duterte's dam holding back the flood of blood buoying up his administration from sinking into its incompetence, has made him forget the fate of one other N4zi criminal.


Goebbels (Ôªøchief propagandist for the N4zis) and his wife committed suicide, after poisoning their six children with cyanide ... a day after Hitler shot himself in the head.
